articles.author: Jenni Reid, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets upbeat ahead of Fed rate decision; UniCredit up 5% - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks are largely positive Wednesday as global investors brace themselves for the U.S. Federal Reserve's latest monetary policy decision.
articles.content:
Maybe Monday's stock market slide shows investors are finally tempering their optimism that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year to counterbalance an economic slowdown.

articles.title: Fed to raise interest rate again amid core inflation pressure - The Guardian
articles.description: Expected hike in benchmark rate to a range of 5% to 5.25% could push US into recession
articles.content:
The US is braced for an interest rate rise on Wednesday that could push the worlds largest economy into recession.
